name: QR Code Generator
description: A simple QR code generator for text and URLs.
longDescription: Generate QR codes from any text or URL input. The generated QR code is saved as a PNG image with customizable filename and location. Perfect for creating quick access codes for websites, contact information, or any text data.
author: ScriptHub

parameters.name: link
parameters.label: Text or URL to encode:
parameters.description: The text, URL, or data to encode in the QR code

parameters.name: output-path
parameters.label: Output folder:
parameters.description: Folder where the QR code image will be saved

parameters.name: filename
parameters.label: File name:
parameters.description: Name for the QR code file (without extension)
